name: Shock Field
description: You create an area of static electricity with a radius of 3 units at a point you can see within a moderate (20 unit) distance. While you concentrate on this spell, you can use subsequent actions to target a creature within the field that you can see and force them to make a resilience check of 9 or higher, or take 10 electric damage.
charge: Instead of shocking a creature, you can attempt to daze them by forcing them to make a concentration check of 8, or stun them by forcing them to make a concentration check of 6.
